name: Fell Dragon's Monocle
title: The Future: Fell Dragon's Monocle
desc: "I will surely return to save all souls. Ten years, even a hundred years may pass, but I shall be reborn as a new universe."
in_play_description: After the character to which this is attached uses an Elemental Skill: Adventure: Once (Once per Round)
